name: BMI Calculator
description: This was my first application. Please do not sue me!

name: Address Book
description: You have a lot of contacts and nowhere to put them. Here is the solution...(Just be careful not to burn your bridges, because a contact cannot be deleted)

name: ATM App
description: Need some cash? Or even better, wanna deposit some cash into my super secure ATM? Please, be my guest. That is why it is here...

name: Library App
description: Do you consider yourself to be a bookworm? Great! This app is for you. We have more than 3 titles to choose from...

name: Blog App
description: Are you a struggling writer? With this state of the art Blog App you can struggle even more...

name: BMI Calculator 2.0
description: Not happy with your BMI results from a previous project? Try it again! This one I built in React. Amazing thing is that you can calculate your BMI using imperial method as well as mertic one. Your choice.

name: Cooper Test
description: The ever popular Cooper Test. You just have to run, enter the distance in meters and get your results. Easy peasy! Oh, and register an account so you can save your performance data and view the past entries displayed on a graph.

name: Slowfood Restaurant
description: Got hungry from all the running? No problemo! Order something from a world famous Janko's Burgers and Pizza restaurant. Bon apetit!

name: Tippler - Cocktails app
description: Fancy a drink after a nice meal! We got just the thing. In this app you can search for your favorite cocktail, get the instructions on how to make it and find info about the alchoholic beverage from that cocktail in System Bolaget.

name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: Oh, it's on! The one and only: Rock, Paper and Scissors game. Choose wisely! Enjoy!

name: The Mars Times
description: Sick and tired from all the bad news on this planet? We got just a thing - The Mars Times! A first news portal on Mars.

name: Editorial - The Mars Times
description: Got all excited abot news from Mars and want to contribute? Great! Go to our editorial site and start writting your own Spacy News. Use email: 'journalist@mail.com', password: 'password'.

name: The Mars Times - Mobile App
description: Yes, the rumours are true! Now you can read all your favorite Mars news on your phone. Built with Ionic.

name: Helping Hand
description: Helping Hand is an app that connects people in need with volunteers to do their shoping.
